collection.title: Anti-Colic Bottles
collection.body_html: Designed to make feeding more comfortable for your little one. Our range of anti-colic baby bottles feature innovative venting systems that reduce air ingestion during feeding. This can help to lessen the discomfort from colic, gas, and reflux. Find a trusted solution for a calmer, happier feeding experience.

products.title: 240ML BPA-Free Anti-Colic Baby Bottle Wide-Neck PP Plastic
products.body_html:
Feeding time should be simple, but it often becomes messy and stressful without the right tools. Spilled milk, bottles that don't seal properly, and nipples that cause colic or gas can quickly frustrate both parent and child. The 240ML Baby Bottle changes that reality by offering a practical, safe, and comfortable feeding solution built to keep babies happy and parents stress-free.

Thoughtfully designed with both function and comfort in mind, the 240ML Baby Bottle provides an easy-to-hold structure, a natural nipple shape, and an anti-colic vent system. Its size is ideal for growing babies, while its lightweight and durable construction makes it just as convenient for home use as for travel. Parents can finally enjoy smoother feeding sessions without worrying about leaks or discomfort.




WHAT MAKES THE 240ML BABY BOTTLE DIFFERENT


✅ ANTI-COLIC TECHNOLOGY – Built with a venting system that prevents air intake, reducing gas and discomfort. Babies experience calmer, happier feeds, and parents enjoy more peaceful nights.

✅ SAFE & DURABLE MATERIAL—The 240ML baby bottle is made with BPA-free, high-quality plastic that resists wear and tear. Parents can trust it to last through daily use while keeping every feed safe.




✅ NATURAL NIPPLE DESIGN – Created to mimic breastfeeding, easing the transition between breast and bottle. This reduces feeding resistance and helps maintain a natural feeding rhythm.

✅ EASY TO CLEAN – The wide-mouth opening makes cleaning and sterilizing quick and thorough. Parents save valuable time while ensuring the 240ML Baby Bottle always remains hygienic.





✅ PERFECT SIZE FOR FEEDING – 240ML The bottle balances capacity and convenience, holding just the right amount for a growing baby. It's compact enough for diaper bags, making feeding on the go stress-free.



SIMPLE TO USE 240ML BABY BOTTLE


1. Fill the 240ML Baby Bottle with milk or formula.

2. Secure the leak-proof lid and nipple.

3. Feed your baby comfortably at home or on the go.

4. Clean with ease and reuse for the next feeding.


Research shows that over 65% of parents face daily feeding challenges like gas, bottle leakage, or nipple rejection. Without the 240ML Baby Bottle, these struggles lead to restless nights, wasted formula, and added frustration during an already busy routine.

Families using the 240ML Baby Bottle report smoother feeding sessions, less fussiness, and more time enjoying their baby instead of troubleshooting feeding issues. With its anti-colic design, natural nipple, and reliable build, this bottle gives parents peace of mind while making every meal a positive experience.



PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS


Material: BPA-free PP Plastic

Colors: Blue, Pink, Yellow, Green

Package Size: 180 x 110 x 60 mm

Care Instructions: Wash and disinfect before each use; store away from insects and bacteria in a sanitary place.



 

A Nestacular Promise

At Nestacular, we believe in the quality of our products, so we offer a 30-day Money-Back Guarantee, no questions asked! When you purchase from us, there is ZERO Risk for you!

Congratulations!

products.title: Adorvia Anti-Colic PP Baby Bottle with Handle - 180-240ML Wide Straw
products.body_html:
Adorvia Wide-Caliber PP Baby Feeding Bottle – Anti-Colic Straw Bottle with Handle

Feed your baby comfortably and safely with the Adorvia Wide-Caliber PP Baby Feeding Bottle. Designed with a wide-caliber straw and anti-colic system, this bottle helps reduce air intake and prevents discomfort during feeding. Made from high-quality, BPA-free PP material, it's durable, lightweight, and safe for infants.

The ergonomic handle makes it easy for toddlers to hold independently, promoting self-feeding skills. With a capacity of 180–240ML, it's perfect for milk, juice, or water. Easy to clean and designed for everyday use, the Adorvia bottle ensures a safe, comfortable, and mess-free feeding experience for your little one.

Key Features

  • Wide-Caliber Straw: Promotes smooth milk flow and reduces feeding time.

  • Anti-Colic Design: Minimizes air intake to prevent gas and discomfort.

  • Ergonomic Handle: Easy for toddlers to hold and promotes self-feeding.

  • Safe & Durable PP Material: BPA-free, lightweight, and long-lasting.

  • Versatile Capacity: 180–240ML for milk, juice, or water.

    Its soft nipple design mimics the natural feel of breastfeeding, providing comfort and helping babies transition smoothly between breast and bottle. With an anti-colic system, the Babsy bottle reduces air intake, preventing gas and discomfort during feeding.

    Lightweight and easy to clean, it's the perfect choice for newborns and infants, giving parents peace of mind and babies a safe, enjoyable feeding experience.

    Key Features:

    • Safe & BPA-Free: Made from food-grade, non-toxic materials.

    • Soft Nipple Design: Mimics breastfeeding for comfort.

    • Anti-Colic System: Prevents gas, spit-up, and fussiness.

    • Lightweight & Durable: Ideal for daily use and travel.

    • Easy to Clean: Simple structure for quick hygiene.

    Give your little one safe and natural feeding with the Babsy Newborn Baby Bottle.

products.title: Bbet Anti-Bloating Wide Mouth Baby Bottle - BPA-Free Shock Resistant
products.body_html:
Bbet Shock-Resistant Wide-Mouthed Baby Bottle

Bbet Shock-Resistant Wide-Mouthed Baby Bottle combines durable, baby-safe design with innovative anti-bloating technology to create the perfect drinking solution for newborns and infants. Thoughtfully engineered for comfort and safety, this versatile bottle also doubles as a mini learning cup to support your child's transition through every stage of feeding.

Smart Design Features

* Shock-resistant wide-mouthed design ensures safety and durability for daily use

* Anti-bloating vent system reduces gas, colic, and discomfort in newborns

* Dual-use functionality works as both a feeding bottle and mini learning cup

* Ergonomic shape makes holding and feeding easier for both parents and babies

* Easy-to-clean wide mouth simplifies sterilization and daily cleaning

* Lightweight, compact size makes it perfect for outings and travel

Setup and Usage

1. Fill bottle with milk, formula, or water as needed.

2. Ensure anti-bloating vent is properly secured before feeding.

3. Use nipple mode for newborns and switch to learning cup mode as your child grows.

4. Clean thoroughly after each use with warm soapy water or sterilizer.

5. Store in a clean, dry place when not in use.

Product Specifications

* Material: BPA-free, food-grade silicone and durable PP

* Capacity: Available in multiple sizes for different feeding needs

* Style: Wide-mouthed, shock-resistant design with anti-bloating vent

* Colors: Soft neutral tones suitable for boys and girls

* Suitable for: Newborns, infants, and toddlers in feeding and transition stages

* Package: 1 bottle with interchangeable nipple and learning cup lid

Why Choose This Bottle

* Shock-resistant construction ensures long-lasting durability even with drops

* Anti-bloating system promotes healthy digestion and reduces fussiness

* Wide-mouth design makes feeding and cleaning simple for parents

* Grows with your baby by transitioning from bottle to cup in one product

* Safe materials give peace of mind for everyday feeding

* Compact and practical for both home use and travel convenience

A Nestacular Promise

products.title: JoyBubs Large Diameter Baby Feeding Bottle – Anti-Colic, Safe & Easy-to-Clean Nursing Bottle for Infants
products.body_html:
Make feeding time smooth and comfortable with the JoyBubs Large Diameter Baby Feeding Bottle, thoughtfully designed for newborns and infants. Crafted from safe, BPA-free materials, this nursing bottle provides a natural and secure feeding experience that closely mimics breastfeeding.

The wide-diameter design makes it easy to fill, clean, and prepare milk or formula, ensuring parents save time while maintaining hygiene. Equipped with an anti-colic nipple, it reduces air intake and prevents gas, burping, and discomfort, keeping your little one happy and well-fed.

The ergonomic shape allows both parents and babies to hold the bottle easily, while the durable, high-quality material ensures long-lasting use. Perfect for daily feeding routines, travel, or as part of your baby care essentials, this bottle combines safety, convenience, and comfort in one.

Key Benefits:

  • Anti-Colic Nipple: Reduces gas and spit-up for a comfortable feeding experience

  • Large Diameter Design: Easy to clean, refill, and prepare milk or formula

  • Safe Materials: BPA-free, non-toxic, and baby-friendly construction

  • Easy to Hold: Ergonomic design for parents and babies

  • Durable & Practical: Ideal for daily feeding and long-term use

Choose the JoyBubs Baby Feeding Bottle for a safer, easier, and more enjoyable feeding time.

products.title: Kidora PPSU Newborn Feeding Bottle – Temperature-Sensing, Anti-Colic & Choke-Proof
products.body_html:
The Kidora PPSU Newborn Feeding Bottle is crafted to deliver a safe, comfortable, and intelligent feeding experience for infants. Made from durable, BPA-free PPSU material, this bottle is lightweight, heat-resistant, and designed for long-lasting use.

Equipped with a temperature-sensing feature, the bottle changes color to help parents ensure milk is at the ideal feeding temperature. Its anti-colic vent system minimizes air intake, reducing gas, spit-up, and discomfort for babies. The choke-proof nipple provides a steady, natural milk flow, making feeding safe and smooth.

Perfect for newborns, the Kidora Feeding Bottle combines safety, innovation, and comfort in one.

Key Features:

  • PPSU Material: Lightweight, durable, and heat-resistant.

  • Temperature-Sensing Design: Helps detect safe milk temperature.

  • Anti-Colic System: Reduces gas & discomfort.

  • Choke-Proof Nipple: Ensures safe milk flow for infants.

  • BPA-Free & Safe: Perfect for everyday feeding.

products.title: LittleLoom Baby Silicone Glass Feeding Bottle – Anti-Fall, Anti-Colic, Safe & Durable for Easy Feeding
products.body_html:
Give your little one a safer and more comfortable feeding experience with the Baby Silicone Glass Feeding Bottle. Designed with both anti-fall protection and an anti-colic vent system, this bottle helps reduce spit-ups, gas, and discomfort while ensuring durability and safety.

Made from premium borosilicate glass wrapped in soft, food-grade silicone, it is shatter-resistant, BPA-free, and heat-resistant, making it safe for daily use. The wide-neck opening allows for easy filling and cleaning, while the soft silicone grip ensures comfort for both parents and babies.

Perfect for formula or breast milk, this bottle combines durability, safety, and comfort—making it an essential for modern parents.

Key Features:

  • Durable glass bottle with soft silicone cover

  • Anti-fall & shatter-resistant for added safety

  • Anti-colic vent system reduces gas & spit-ups

  • BPA-free, heat-resistant & food-grade materials

  • Wide-neck design for easy cleaning & filling

A practical, safe, and long-lasting feeding solution for your growing baby.

Crafted from BPA-free, food-grade materials, the OpalNest bottle is safe, easy to clean, and compatible with most standard bottle accessories. The ergonomic shape makes handling easier for both parents and little ones learning to hold their bottle. Perfect for milk, formula, or liquid supplements.

products.body_html:
The SnugNest Drop-Resistant Glass Baby Bottle is specially designed for safe and stress-free feeding. Made from premium borosilicate glass, it offers superior durability while resisting drops and temperature changes. Perfect for both milk and water feeding, this bottle ensures your baby’s comfort and safety.

Equipped with a soft straw nipple, it mimics natural breastfeeding and makes sipping easier for newborns and toddlers. Its anti-colic design reduces gas, spit-up, and fussiness, while the ergonomic shape allows little hands to hold it with ease.

Easy to clean, hygienic, and built to last, the SnugNest glass baby bottle is an excellent choice for parents looking for a safe, eco-friendly, and reliable feeding solution.

Key Features:

  • Drop-Resistant Glass: Durable, heat-resistant borosilicate material.

  • Straw Nipple Design: Comfortable feeding for newborns & toddlers.

  • Anti-Colic System: Prevents gas and feeding discomfort.

  • Multi-Use Feeder: Suitable for both milk and water.

  • Safe & Easy to Clean: BPA-free, eco-friendly, and hygienic.

Give your little one safe and natural feeding with the SnugNest Drop-Resistant Glass Baby Bottle.
